_G.killing = true

local ignoreplrs = {
    ["gay"]= true
    }



while _G.killing == true do
    for i,plr in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if not ignoreplrs[plr.Name] then
            math.randomseed(tick()+i)
                        -- Stack Begin
            -- Script 'km3dA2jPD7F3Qa215UynDO', Line 2985 - method FireServer
            -- Script 'ReplicatedStorage.ServerStats.Scripts.TracerModule', Line 188
            -- Stack End
            -- Script was generated by Filtershark
            local tbl_main = 
            {
                  plr.name, 
                  math.huge, 
                  Vector3.new(math.random(-10000, 10000), math.random(-10000, 10000), math.random(-10000, 10000)), 
                  "PISTOL"
            }    
            game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").Remotes.Damage:FireServer(unpack(tbl_main))

        end
        
    end
    --_G.killing = false
    wait(1)
end
